column2: 19-24 Female  on Treatment for 1 to 6 months (Patient) $3$2$3$It was starting to work fine after 2 weeks because of neuropathic pain due to a laparoscopic operation..But I took it off friday arvo for my birthday so I could drink and not get too unwell..Then ended up drinking again saturday and forgot to reapply till monday..Not feeling @ all great & feel sick everytime I eat..I hope it isn't from this I'm in chronic agony all over again..Kinda wish I'd kept to all my meds I was prescribed and now tempted to have another drink just to get rid of the pain but fully not keen on the after effects of alchy!! Had a bit of drug n alchy problems b4 it which i also can say it has helped me with withdrawls but it wasn't prescribed to me for that so ugggggh ahhhhhhh

column1: 3$Condition: High Blood Pressure$9/22/2009 12:25:37 PM$Reviewer: HoneyDoforYou Handyman
column2: 55-64 Male  on Treatment for 2 to less than 5 years (Patient) $5$4$3$"Started with Catapres TTS2 patches which sometimes came off but the overlay would eliminate problems and the medication delivery was consistent either way.  Dropped BP an additional 20-30 points!

column1: Switched to generic Clonidine patch which never stayed on even with overlay.  Would recommend sticking with Catapres TTS unless you are sedintary and don't sweat or move much. I also take Minoxidil (10mg) x2
column6: Nexium (40mg) and have no obvious side effects from anything other than lower blood pressure

column1: 4$Condition: High Blood Pressure$9/14/2009 1:02:50 PM$Reviewer: bernee
column2: 45-54 Female  on Treatment for 2 to less than 5 years (Patient) $5$5$5$Very Satisfied
column3: but do not get the generic brand as the patch did not stick to my skin; even with the overlay patch.  Had to replace after 1 day and then the next one still did not stick.  Stick with name brand-no generic.

column1: 5$Condition: High Blood Pressure$8/2/2009 10:54:10 PM$Reviewer: 65-74 Female  on Treatment for 1 to 6 months (Patient) $3$3$5$If I put the patch on and take my oral meds. at the same time
column2: I get a very severe case of orthostatic hypotension.  Then the last 2 days of the patch my BP  begins to rise to higher levels than the first few days of the use of the patch.
